INSERT INTO FORM_1( SEQ, EMP_NO, TITLE, OFF_TYPE, START_TIME, END_TIME, REASON ) VALUES( FORM_1_SEQ.nextval, #{empNo}, #{title}, #{offType}, TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DDHH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DDHH24:MI'), #{reason} )
SELECT FORM_1_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO FORM_2( SEQ, EMP_NO, TITLE, CREATE_DATE, START_DATE, END_DATE, CONTENT1, CONTENT2, CONTENT3, CONTENT4 ) VALUES( FORM_2_SEQ.nextval, #{empNo}, #{title}, TO_DATE(#{createDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{content1}, #{content2}, #{content3}, #{content4} )
SELECT FORM_2_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO WORKFLOW_APPROVAL( SEQ, FORM_SEQ, DOC_SEQ, EMP_NO, STEP, ACTIVATE ) VALUES ( WORKFLOW_APPROVAL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{formSeq}, #{docSeq}, #{empNo}, #{step}, 'Y' 'N' )
INSERT INTO WORKFLOW_REF( SEQ, FORM_SEQ, DOC_SEQ, EMP_NO ) VALUES ( WORKFLOW_REF_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{formSeq}, #{docSeq}, #{empNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT X.* FROM (SELECT F.SEQ as DOC_SEQ, F.FORM_SEQ, F.TITLE, A.MAX_APPROVAL, A.APPROVAL_CNT, F.LAST_APPROVAL_TIME, F.LAST_APPROVAL_EMP, F.CREATE_TIME FROM (SELECT F.SEQ as SEQ, COUNT(WA.SEQ) as MAX_APPROVAL, MAX(APPROVE_TIME) as LAST_APPROVAL_TIME, COUNT(CASE WHEN WA.IS_APPROVE = 'Y' THEN 1 END) AS APPROVAL_CNT FROM FORM_1 F JOIN WORKFLOW_APPROVAL WA on F.SEQ = WA.DOC_SEQ AND F.FORM_SEQ = WA.FORM_SEQ WHERE F.EMP_NO = #{empNo} GROUP BY F.SEQ, F.FORM_SEQ) A JOIN FORM_1 F ON F.SEQ = A.SEQ WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} UNION ALL SELECT F.SEQ as DOC_SEQ, F.FORM_SEQ, F.TITLE, A.MAX_APPROVAL, A.APPROVAL_CNT, F.LAST_APPROVAL_TIME, F.LAST_APPROVAL_EMP, F.CREATE_TIME FROM (SELECT F.SEQ as SEQ, COUNT(WA.SEQ) as MAX_APPROVAL, MAX(APPROVE_TIME) as LAST_APPROVAL_TIME, COUNT(CASE WHEN WA.IS_APPROVE = 'Y' THEN 1 END) AS APPROVAL_CNT FROM FORM_2 F JOIN WORKFLOW_APPROVAL WA on F.SEQ = WA.DOC_SEQ AND F.FORM_SEQ = WA.FORM_SEQ WHERE F.EMP_NO = #{empNo} GROUP BY F.SEQ, F.FORM_SEQ) A JOIN FORM_2 F ON F.SEQ = A.SEQ WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}) X ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC
SELECT F.*, H.EMP_NAME as WRITER, D.DEP_NAME as WRITER_DEP, H.EMP_RANK as WRITER_RANK FROM FORM_1 F JOIN HR H ON F.EMP_NO = H.EMP_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D on H.DEP_NO = D.DEP_NO WHERE SEQ = #{docSeq}
SELECT F.*, H.EMP_NAME as WRITER, D.DEP_NAME as WRITER_DEP, H.EMP_RANK as WRITER_RANK FROM FORM_2 F JOIN HR H ON F.EMP_NO = H.EMP_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D on H.DEP_NO = D.DEP_NO WHERE SEQ = #{docSeq}

SELECT X.* FROM (SELECT A.DOC_SEQ, A.FORM_SEQ, H.EMP_NAME as WRITER_NAME, D.DEP_NAME as WRITER_DEP, F.TITLE, F.CREATE_TIME, A.IS_APPROVE, A.APPROVE_TIME, A.ACTIVATE FROM FORM_1 F JOIN WORKFLOW_APPROVAL A ON F.SEQ = A.DOC_SEQ AND F.FORM_SEQ = A.FORM_SEQ JOIN HR H ON F.EMP_NO = H.EMP_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON H.DEP_NO = D.DEP_NO WHERE A.EMP_NO = #{empNo} UNION SELECT A.DOC_SEQ, A.FORM_SEQ, H.EMP_NAME as WRITER_NAME, D.DEP_NAME as WRITER_DEP, F.TITLE, F.CREATE_TIME, A.IS_APPROVE, A.APPROVE_TIME, A.ACTIVATE FROM FORM_2 F JOIN WORKFLOW_APPROVAL A ON F.SEQ = A.DOC_SEQ AND F.FORM_SEQ = A.FORM_SEQ JOIN HR H ON F.EMP_NO = H.EMP_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON H.DEP_NO = D.DEP_NO WHERE A.EMP_NO = #{empNo}) X ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC
